briefdescription.para: Creates a builder for a new BSplitView.

parameterdescription.para: The orientation for the new BSplitView.
The spacing for the new BSplitView.

briefdescription.para: Creates a builder for an existing BSplitView.

parameterdescription.para: The existing view to operate on.

detaileddescription.para: Get a pointer to the BView this builder's layout is attached to.
Get a pointer to the BView this builder's layout is attached to.

parameterdescription.para: The BView this builder's layout is attached to.

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer to the SplitBView this builder is attached to.

parameterdescription.para: The BSplitView this builder' is attached to.

briefdescription.para: Cast this builder into the layout object it represents.
Add a view to the underlying BSplitView.

detaileddescription.para: The view will be added to the right or the bottom of the existing elements.

parameterdescription.para: The BView to be added. The underlying BSplitView will take ownership of the object.

briefdescription.para: Add a view with a weight to the underlying BSplitView.

detaileddescription.para: The view will be added to the right or the bottom of the existing elements.

parameterdescription.para: The BView to be added. The underlying BSplitView will take ownership of the object.
The weight of the view.

briefdescription.para: Add a item to the underlying BSplitView.

detaileddescription.para: The layout item will be added to the right or the bottom of the existing elements.

parameterdescription.para: The BLayoutItem to be added. The underlying BSplitView will take ownership of the object.

briefdescription.para: Add an item with a weight to the underlying BSplitView.

detaileddescription.para: The layout item will be added to the right or the bottom of the existing elements.

parameterdescription.para: The BLayoutItem to be added. The underlying BSplitView will take ownership of the object.
The weight of the item.

sectiondef.header: Adding BLayouts and their BView Pairs

description.para: A set of methods that add a BLayout or BView subclass and return a BLayoutBuilder::Base subclass representing the newly added object. These methods push a new builder on top of the stack, you will not be using this builder again until you call End().

para.ref: BLayoutBuilder::Group<ParentBuilder>::AddGroup( orientation orientation, float spacing, float weight)

parameterdescription.para: The orientation to use for the new BGroupLayout.
The spacing to use for the new BGroupLayout.
The weight for the new BGroupLayout in the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

simplesect.para: A GroupBuilder representing the newly created BGroupLayout.

parameterdescription.para: The BGroupView to be added.
The weight for groupView in the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

simplesect.para: A GroupBuilder representing the layout of the groupView.

parameterdescription.para: The BGroupLayout to be added.
The weight for groupLayout in the BGroupLayout this builder represents.

para.ref: BLayoutBuilder::Group<ParentBuilder>::AddGrid( float horizontalSpacing, float verticalSpacing, float weight)

detaileddescription.para: Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddGrid() methods.

parameterdescription.para: The horizontal spacing for the new BGridLayout.

The weight for the new BGridLayout in the BSplitView this builder represents.

simplesect.para: A GridBuilder representing the newly created BGridLayout.

parameterdescription.para: The BGridView to be added and used to construct the returned GridBuilder.
The weight for gridView in the BSplitView this builder represents.

simplesect.para: A GridBuilder representing the layout of the gridView.

parameterdescription.para: The BGridLayout to be added and used to construct the returned GridBuilder.
The weight for gridLayout in the BSplitView this builder represents.

detaileddescription.para: Set the whether all the layout items in this view are collapsible.

parameterdescription.para: true if all items in this layout are collapsible, false if they are not.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether the item at index is collapsible.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the item (zero-based).
true if the user may collaps the item, false if they may not.

detaileddescription.para: Set whether the items from first to last are collapsible.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the first item that you want the setting to apply to (zero-based).
The index of the last item that you want the setting to apply to (zero-based).
true if the user may collaps the item, false if they may not.

The top inset.
The right inset.
The bottom inset.

detaileddescription.para: Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddCards() methods.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddGrid() methods.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddGroup() methods.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddSplit() methods.
Shorthand representing the type of this.

Haiku R1
A BSplitView consists of elements, for which in between there are dividers that the user can manipulate to alter the division of space between each of the element.s
For a detailed view on the properties, see the class description.
